text: Aur woh waqt bhi qabil-e-zikar hai jab hum ney pahar ko utha ker sayebaan ki tarah unn per moalliq ker diya aur inn ko yaqeen hogaya kay abb inn per gira aur kaha kay jo kitab hum ney tum ko di hai ussay mazbooti kay sath qabool kero aur yaad rakho jo ehkaam iss mein hain uss say tawaqqa hai kay tum mutaqqi bann jao
